verses.verse: For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> does <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and from <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H4937>stay<s%> and the <S%H4938>staff,<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8172>stay<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4937>stay<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>
The <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and the man of <S%H4421>war,<s%> the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and the <S%H7080>prudent,<s%> and the <S%H2204>ancient,<s%>

The <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and the <S%H5375>honorable<s%> <S%H6440><s%> man, and the <S%H3289>counselor,<s%> and the <S%H2450>cunning<s%> <S%H2796>artificer,<s%> and the <S%H995>eloquent<s%> <S%H3908>orator.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5288>children<s%> to be their <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H8586>babes<s%> shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H5065>oppressed,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> by another, and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> by his <S%H7453>neighbor:<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall <S%H7292>behave<s%> himself <S%H7292>proudly<s%> against the <S%H2204>ancient,<s%> and the <S%H7034>base<s%> against the <S%H3519>honorable.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H8610>hold<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> saying, You have <S%H8071>clothing,<s%> be you our <S%H7101>ruler,<s%> and let <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4384>ruin<s%> be <S%H8478>under<s%> your <S%H3027>hand:<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall he <S%H5375>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I will not be an <S%H2280>healer;<s%> for in my <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H8071>clothing:<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> me not a <S%H7101>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

For <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H3782>ruined,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> and their <S%H4611>doings<s%> are <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H4784>provoke<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

The <S%H1971>show<s%> of their <S%H6440>countenance<s%> does <S%H5707>witness<s%> against them; and they <S%H5046>declare<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> they <S%H3582>hide<s%> it not. <S%H188>Woe<s%> to their <S%H5315>soul!<s%> for they have <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to <S%H1992>themselves.<s%>
<S%H559>Say<s%> you to the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> that it shall be <S%H2896>well<s%> with him: for they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>
<S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked!<s%> it shall be <S%H7451>ill<s%> with him: for the <S%H1576>reward<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H6213>given<s%> him.

As for my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5768>children<s%> are their <S%H5065>oppressors,<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them. O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> they which <S%H833>lead<s%> you cause you to <S%H8582>err,<s%> and <S%H1104>destroy<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H734>paths.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5324>stands<s%> up to <S%H7378>plead,<s%> and <S%H5975>stands<s%> to <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with the <S%H2204>ancients<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof: for you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> up the <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> the <S%H1500>spoil<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> is in your <S%H1004>houses.<s%>

<S%H4100>What<s%> mean you that you <S%H1792>beat<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to pieces, and <S%H2912>grind<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor?<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H1361>haughty,<s%> and <S%H3212>walk<s%> with <S%H5186>stretched<s%> forth <S%H1627>necks<s%> and <S%H8265>wanton<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> and <S%H2952>mincing<s%> as they <S%H3212>go,<s%> and making a <S%H5913>tinkling<s%> with their <S%H7272>feet:<s%>

Therefore the <S%H136>LORD<s%> will <S%H5596>smite<s%> with a <S%H5596>scab<s%> the <S%H6936>crown<s%> of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6168>discover<s%> their <S%H6596>secret<s%> parts.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8597>bravery<s%> of their tinkling <S%H5914>ornaments<s%> about their feet, and their <S%H7636>cauls,<s%> and their <S%H7720>round<s%> <S%H7720>tires<s%> like the moon,
The <S%H5188>chains,<s%> and the <S%H8285>bracelets,<s%> and the <S%H7479>mufflers,<s%>
The <S%H6287>bonnets,<s%> and the <S%H6807>ornaments<s%> of the <S%H6807>legs,<s%> and the <S%H7196>headbands,<s%> and the <S%H1004>tablets,<s%> <S%H5315><s%> and the <S%H3908>earrings,<s%>
The <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and <S%H639>nose<s%> <S%H5141>jewels,<s%>
The <S%H4254>changeable<s%> <S%H2470>suits<s%> of <S%H4254>apparel,<s%> and the <S%H4595>mantles,<s%> and the <S%H4304>wimples,<s%> and the <S%H2754>crisping<s%> pins,
The <S%H1549>glasses,<s%> and the fine <S%H5466>linen,<s%> and the <S%H6797>hoods,<s%> and the <S%H7289>veils.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H1314>smell<s%> there shall be <S%H4716>stink;<s%> and <S%H8478>instead<s%> of a <S%H2290>girdle<s%> a <S%H5364>rent;<s%> and <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H4639>well<s%> set <S%H4748>hair<s%> <S%H7144>baldness;<s%> and <S%H8478>instead<s%> of a <S%H6614>stomacher<s%> a <S%H4228>girding<s%> of <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> and <S%H3587>burning<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>
Your <S%H4962>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and your <S%H1369>mighty<s%> in the <S%H4421>war.<s%>
And her <S%H6607>gates<s%> shall <S%H578>lament<s%> and <S%H56>mourn;<s%> and she being <S%H5352>desolate<s%> shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
